Accuracy.description: The precision of the final answer in relation to the optimal or correct choice based on the game mechanics.

Solution Completeness.description: Degree to which the proposed solution covers all aspects and steps required to answer the challenge question comprehensively.

Reasoning Transparency.description: The clarity and traceability of the reasoning process that has led to the solution.

Efficiency.description: The number of steps taken or the time expended to reach a solution in comparison to an expected benchmark.

Robustness.description: The solution's capability to maintain performance when faced with different or changing inputs.

Reproducibility.description: The ability to reach the same conclusions through the same process by different agents or at different times.

Innovation.description: The level of creativity or novelty in the approach taken to solve the task.

Ethical Consideration.description: Adherence to ethical standards in the methodology and solution provided for the task.
